text: 8.5-6: Mal 2.10; Zo 1.3; FG 17.28; Ro 11.36; 1 Ko 12.6; Ef 4.5-6; Fi 2.11Khueŋ guigi guarara, mbe fhura “tori gu mbarɨvi” kaai bigi vhɨrve gum gumgi mbari “guma bakɨmen” kaai bigi vhɨrve kha buip gu nuianan ki. Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨ bavira ki. Ana nzan Ndia ma. Ana za kha bigi nɨɨŋge ma. Ana bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ nza ndɨɨim, nza ki. Nza vhɨra Guma Bakɨ bavira ki, ana Zisas Krais ma. Anan panan Fhe Bakɨme za kha bigi ga muuŋgiap, vhɨra anan panan ana bɨɨŋbɨɨn nza nɨɨŋgi.
